title: DWORD falling edge counting
name: LGF_CountFalInDWord
description: The function analyzes a variable of the type DWORD and outputs how often a 1-0 sequence (falling edge) occurs in the variable.

input.name: value
input.description: Input Double word in which the falling edges are counted

output.name: numberOfEdges
output.description: Number of falling edges in the DWord
